item.description:
Rheebo.com thinks of community as people, small businesses and non-profits interacting together.Rheebo.com invites you to their first Annual Holiday Party on Tuesday December 18t at Newburyport City Hall Auditorium, 60 Pleasant Street from 5m-9pm.

Come celebrate the holidays with your favorite local businesses and not-for-profits! There will be shopping from over 30 local businesses, complimentary food sampling from local Greater Newburyport restaurants as well beverages from wineries and breweries. The hall will also be filled with LIVE  music by Michael Troy!The fun starts at 5pm and ends at 9pm and everyone's invited. Get in some last minute holiday shopping, eat, drink and enjoy some great music!

 

If you are a local merchant and would like a free table to sell gift items or gift cards, please call Susan at 617-590-4151.
item.name: Rheebo.com Holiday Party-Newburyport
